title: Xing Xang: Presumed Dead
description: Xing Xang is an adventure story of a teenagerâ€™s emotional, physical and moral transformation. His foster parents and friends at school think he has drowned at sea. He travels around the world searching for a lost civilization in his quest to find the clues left for him by his natural father - a once-famous psycho-archaeologist. With the help of a curious group of intellectuals, after a series of life-transforming events, Eli finds out who he is.
author: Todd Tracy
